2 sts 4 double_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts repeat from * 8 times fasten_off and leave a long yarn tail with total 40 total sts slip_stitch in next st yarn needle weave the tail through flo round 22 change to dark yellow yarn *single_crochet to close the opening do not cut yarn in next 4 sts spsc in next st repeat from * 8 times total 40 total sts change to light to help the pineapple
